verses.roman:
tomāra caraṇe mora nāhi prema-leśa
tomā chāḍi' pāpī muñi genu anya deśa

synonyms: tomāra caraṇe—at Your lotus feet; mora—my; nāhi—there is not; prema-leśa—a trace of love; tomā—You; chāḍi'—giving up; pāpī—sinful; muñi—I; genu—went; anya deśa—to another country.
translation: "My dear Lord, I do not even possess a trace of love at Your lotus feet. If I did, how could I go to another country? I am therefore a most sinful man.
